Do you have problems with communication or understanding?
Rehabilitation inpatient acute care. Did the acute inpatient care include dedicated stroke rehabilitation?

Rehabilitation post-acute care. Did the post-acute care include dedicated stroke rehabilitation? Dedicated stroke rehabilitation during post-acute care, either hospital-based or out patient/home based.
